title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A blue car drives down a busy city street with tall buildings and palm trees on the side of the road.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is almost stopped (average speed â‰ˆ 0.0 m/s). There are 30 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed and brakes frequently to avoid collisions with other vehicles. The blue car is changing lanes to overtake a slower vehicle. The tall buildings and palm trees on the side of the road indicate that this is a busy city street.
